nodes.text: The waveform was a Force technique used by the Selkath adepts of the Order of Shasa. Inspired by the oceans of Manaan, waveform techniques allowed Order devotees to enhance telekinetic abilities by manipulating the natural wave patterns in nature and the particles of the surrounding environment. Similar in principle to Alter Environment, it was applied to a much more personal scale, bolstering Force pushes and other telekinetic skills.
